src_text: IKhabinethi iyitjhejile indima eyenziwako ekuphumeleliseni iHlelo lamaGadango weGezi, ithi itjhejile njalo ibe ivuma nokuthi kusese kunengi okuliya ukusebenza kwethungelelwano legezi lelizwe loke.
tgt_text: Fulufulu.

Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho kha zwa thoma shumiswa ha Pulane ya Mashumele ya zwa Fulufulu, ngeno nga thungo tshi khou dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza vhuleme vhuhulwane vhukuma vhune ha kha ḓi vha hone kha sisṱeme ya lushaka ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi..

src_text: Njengoba kungena ubusika nje, iKhabinethi ithokozele ukuqedelelwa kweGontraga yokungezelela amandla wegezi ngama-400 wama-megawatts (ama-MW) ngehlelo i-Standard Offer Programme elizokuthoma ukusebenza ngaphambi kokuphela kukaMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Zwenezwi musi shango ḽi tshi khou dzhena kha khalaṅwaha ya Vhuriha, Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa khunyeledzwa ha Khonṱhiraka ya ṋetshedza muḓagasi wa 400 megawatsi (MW) dza ḓadzisa nga kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Ṋetshedzo yo Linganaho (Standard Offer Programme) dzine dza ḓo thoma vha hone kha sisṱeme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi phanḓa ha musi ṅwedzi wa Shundunthule 2023 tshi fhela..

Nga nnḓa ha izwo, Muhasho wa Mutakalo wo ṱalusa zwibadela zwa 213 sa zwone zwine zwa tea sa kwamea nga mafhungo u khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana, hune zwibadela zwi linganaho 76 kha zwenezwi, zwa vha uri zwo no ḓi thoma sa kwamea nga uhu khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana ngeno hu na uri mushumo wa engedza zwiṅwe zwibadela zwi linganaho 46 kha mutevhe wa izwo zwine zwa si tee kwamea nga izwo zwa khaulwa ha muḓagasi tsini na khunyeledzwa..

src_text: Ukudlula lapho, umNyango wezePilo ukhombe iimbhedlela ezima-213 ekungasafanelanga ziqinteliswe igezi; kileziimbhedlela, ezima-76 zazo vele azisaqinteliselwa igezi, kanti-ke kusasetjenzelwa ukungezelela ezinye ezima-46 ngokukhamba kwesikhathi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza zwa rwelwa ṱari ha Energy One-Stop Shop zwine zwa khou ḓo vha hone hu si kale nga ḽa 31 Shundunthule 2023 nga vha Invest SA itela tshimbidza mafhungo zwa milayo ine ya ḓo thusa khamphani ntswa dza bveledza muḓagasi itela uri na dzone dzi thome shuma nga ṱavhanya..

Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha mvelaphanḓa yo no itwaho fhaḽa kha Tshiṱitshi tsha Muḓagasi tsha Kusile hu tshi itelwa vhuedzedzwa hafhu ha muḓagasi linganaho 3 200 MW, kha yunithi dza 1, 2, 3 na 5, murahu kha sisṱeme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi ya lushaka mafheloni ṅwaha wa..

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yathokozela nokuvulwa okuseduze kwesiTolo seGezi esiPhethe Koke ngomhla wama-31 kuMrhayili esizokuvulwa yi-Invest SA kobanyana kuzokhanjiswa msinyana amahlelo wokulawula azokusiza iinkhampani eziphehla igezi ezitja ezizako.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo kwamea nga zwiito zwa phaḓaladzwa ha mafhungo ane si vhe ngoho zwine zwa khou bvela phanḓa, hu tshi khou shumiswa nyanḓadzamafhungo dza matshilisano hune khadzo ha khou ambiwa zwauri hu si kale hu khou ḓo vha na wa tshoṱhe ha sisṱeme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi ya lushaka, zwine ha khou pfala uri zwi ḓo fhedza zwo vhanga dzima tshoṱhe ha muḓagasi shango ḽoṱhe.
Eskom yo fulufhedzisa muvhuso uri hu na pulane dzi re hone kha sisṱeme yavho dza thivhela uri hu si vhe na dzima lwa tshoṱhe ha muḓagasi kha shango ḽoṱhe.

src_text: Itjheje godu nendima eyenziwako ePhawa iKusile yokubuyisela igezi ezii-3 200 MW, ngamaziko 1, 2, 3 ne-5 ethungelelwaneni legezi lelizwe, nakuphela umnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ombedzela khuwelelo kha vhathu vhoṱhe vha fhano Afrika Tshipembe ya uri vha bvele phanḓa na vhulunga muḓagasi.

Tshipikwa tshihulwane ndi vhulunga muḓagasi linganaho 1 000 MW ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe, zwine hezwi zwa lingana na vhulunga luṱa lwoṱhe lwa thoma lwa khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe.

src_text: IKhabinethi iphatheke kumbi ngeendaba ezimamanga esele ziphikelele, eenkundleni zeendaba ezithi batjho kuseduze ukuthi ithungelelwano legezi lifadalale kuphele ngalo bese sisala emnyameni.
tgt_text: Minisṱa vha Muḓagasi, Dokotela Vho Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, vha ḓo ḓivhadza shango nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Pulane ya Mashumele ya zwa Fulufulu nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 26 Shundunthule 2023, musi vha tshi khou amba na vhoramafhungo.

src_text: U-Eskom uqinisekise urhulumende ngamahlelo akhona ekuzakukhandelwa ngawo ukuthi kungafiki lapho igezi iphela khona yoke sisale emnyameni ilizwe loke.
tgt_text: Mutakalo.

Muvhuso wo vhumba komiti ya shuma ya zwa thekiniki, ine ya khou langwa nga Muhasho wa Mutakalo wa Lushaka, nga murahu ha musi ho vha na tshiwo tsha vhulwadze ha Khoḽera ngei Hammanskraal kha Ḓorobo khulwane ya Tshwane, vhune ho no vhulaha vhathu vha swikaho 15 swika zwino, nga ḽa 24 Shundunthule..

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuyelela isibawo ebantwini boke beSewula Afrika ukuthi baragele phambili ngokunconcosela igezi.
tgt_text: Hu na mushumo muhulwane re kati zwazwino wa ita ndingo kha zwiko zwoṱhe zwine zwa nga vha zwi zwone zwo ḓisaho tshikafhadzo iyi, zwi nga vha zwiko zwa maḓi, maḽori u ṋetshedza maḓi, dzibommbi na tshiimiswa tsha Mishumo ya Kunakisa Maḓi Mashika tsha Rooiwal (WWTW) swika zwino hu athu wanala vhuṱanzi vhu sumbaho uri ho wanala bakhitheria ya khoḽera kha zwiko izwi, zwine hezwi zwa ṋea fulufhelo ḽa uri hu na khonadzeo ya uri tshiwo itshi tsha khoḽera tshi nga vha tsho vha hone nga mulandu wa tshikafhadzwa ho bvelelaho fhethu huthihi fhedzi, lune zwiwo zwi re hone zwazwino zwa nga vha zwo vha hone nga mulandu wa tshikafhala ho vhangwaho nga zwiitisi zwa vhuvhili na zwa vhuraru (phiriselano).

src_text: Umnqopho kukuthi kulondwe i-1 000 MW yegezi qobe lilanga; lokhu-ke kulingana nokulonda igezi elingana nehlandla linye lokuqinteliswa kwegezi ilanga nelanga.
tgt_text: Musi maga aya u lingedza tandulula thaidzo iyi tshi khou ḓi bvela phanḓa, vhadzulapo vha fhaḽa Hammanskraal vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa uri vha vhilise maḓi avho bommbini nahone vha shele na muṋo muṱuku phanḓa ha musi vha tshi nwa.
Zwiṅwe hafhu, muthu muṅwe na muṅwe ane vha na malani silingwa kana tsumbadwadze dza thaidzo ya tsukanyo tea uri nga ṱavhanya dalele dokotela wawe kana kiḽiniki ya henefho tsini nae..

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezeGezi uDorh.
tgt_text: Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili, Vho Senzo Mchunu, vha ḓo vha na muṱangano na Ṋeḓorobo wa Ḓorobo khulwane ya Tshwane, Mukhantseḽara Vho Cilliers Brink, nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 26 Shundunthule 2023 itela lingedza bveledza pulane yo ṱanganelaho ya mushumo wa vusuluswa ha tshiimiswa tsha Rooiwal WWTW tshine tsho vha tsho tea tsho no vusuluswa kale itela wana zwidodombedzwa zwinzhi, vha nga founela kha nomboro ya luṱingo ya Tshiimiswa tsha Malwadze Phirela tsha Lushaka (NICD) shumaho awara dza 24 nga ḓuvha kha 082 883.

src_text: Kgosientsho Ramokgopa uzokubikela ilizwe emhlanganweni wembikiindaba ngokuphunyeleliswa kweHlelo lamaGadango weGezi ngeLesihlanu nakama-26 kuMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Tsumbamaitele dza ilafha vhulwadze ha Khoḽera dzi wanala kha inthanethe kha www.nicd.ac.za.
Ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa Vhashumi dza Kotara (QLFS).

src_text: Zepilo
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri QLFS ya thoma ya ṅwaha wa 2023 yo sumbedzisa uri ho vha na nyengedzedzo ya vhurathi ya nga kotara nga tevhekana kha tshivhalo tsha mishumo khathihi na uri zwa tholwa ha vhathu vha swikaho.
2 miḽioni zwi khou vhonala zwi tshi khou ri sendedzela tsini na uri ri swike kha tshivhalo tsha.

src_text: Urhulumende usungule ikomidi yomsebenzi ethwelwe mNyango wezePilo weliZweloke, ezakuqalana nokwehla kwesifo sekholera e-Hammanskraal esiphandeni se-Tshwane, ekuthe kufika umhla wama-24 kuMrhayili wee-2023 sabe sesithethe abantu abali-.
tgt_text: 4 miḽioni tsha vhathu vho tholiwaho kha maḓuvha phanḓa ha tshiwo tsha dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).
Hezwi zwi tou vha tsumbo re khagala ya uri ikonomi ya Afrika Tshipembe khou vhonala tshi khou vhuyelela nga nḓila yo khwaṱhaho vhukuma bva kha masiandaitwa dwadze iḽo..

src_text: Sikhuluma nje mkhulu umsebenzi owenziwako wokuhlola yoke imithombo engahle ibe kulapho kucabheleke khona, kungaba kusemithonjeni yamanzi ngokwayo, kungaba sematankeni adiliva amanzi, kungaba seempompeni namkha ebuTsengelweni baManzi i-Rooivaal Wastewater Treatment Works (i-WWTW).
tgt_text: Mbalombalo dza nga ha vhathu vhane vha khou shuma dza kotara ya thoma dzo sumbedza uri ho sikwa mishumo swikaho 209 000 kha sekhithara yo dzudzanyeaho ngeno miṅwe mishumo ya 107 000 yo sikwa kha sekhithara songo dzudzanyeaho kha tshifhinga tsha kotara ya thoma ya ṅwaha..

src_text: Bekube nje, akunabufakazi bomulwana wekholera esele butholakele kilemithombo; lokhu-ke kungatjho khona ukuthi mhlambe ukwehla kwesifesi kusukele esehlakalweni sinye sokusilaphazeka, abantu base bayathelelana ukusukela lapho bekufike kilobubujamo banje.
tgt_text: Vhushaka ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Amerika (US) .

Khabinethe yo ombedzela zwauri vhushaka vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Amerika vhu kha ḓi vha havhuḓi, ho khwaṱha nahone vhune ha vhuedza masia oṱhe swika zwino nga murahu ha muṱangano we wa vha hone vhukati ha Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Vhushaka ha Dzitshaka na Tshumisano, Dokotela Vho Naledi Pandor na Muambasada wa ḽa Amerika fhano Afrika Tshipembe, Vho Reuben Brigety, nga murahu ha maambiwa avho he khao vha vha vha tshi khou pomoka

src_text: Njengoba kuthathwa lamagadango nje, izakhamuzi ze-Hammanskraal zikhuthazwa ukuthi ziwabilise amanzi wazo wepompo bese ziwanunga ngetsherwana yetshwayi ngaphambi kobana ziwasele.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe uri ḽo ṋetshedza zwiṱhavhane kha shango ḽa Russia.

src_text: Ngaphezu kwalokho, umuntu ogijinyiswa yindeni, osililekako namkha onamatshayo wokuthi kunento engakalungi ngendeni akarhabele kudorhodere namkha etlinigi yangekhabo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ombedzela zwauri hu na nḓila dzi ḓivheaho dza zwa vhudipuḽomati dzine dza tea shumiswa nga tshaka dzoṱhe, hu tshi katelwa na shango ḽa US, kha bvisela khagala thaidzo dzine vha vha nadzo zwenezwo musi dzi tshi tutuwa kha zwa kulangelwe kwa vhushaka ha vhavhili.

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza nḓivhadzo nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa ya vhumbwa ha ṱhoḓisiso yo ḓiimisaho nga yoṱhe ya ṱoḓisisa mavharivhari u ṋetshedzwa ha zwiṱhavhane zwi bvaho fhano kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe zwi tshi ṋewa shango ḽa Russia.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezaManzi nezokuHlwengisa uNom.
tgt_text: Zwidodombedzwa zwa ṱhoḓisiso iyo zwi ḓo ḓivhadzwa musi tshifhinga tshi tshi swika.

src_text: Senzo Mchunu uzokubonana noMeyara we-Tshwane uKhansela Cilliers Brink ngeLesihlanu womhla wama-26 kuMrhayili wee-2023 emzameni wokutlama ihlelo elihlanganyelweko lokuvuselela i-Rooiwal WWTW, esele kukade seqa isikhathi sokuyivuselela.
tgt_text: Vhushaka vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Singapore.
Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho ṱanganedza Minisṱa Muhulwane wa Riphabuḽiki ya Singapore Vho Lee Hsien Loong nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 16 Shundunthule..

src_text: Eminye imininingwana ungayithola ngokufowunela iZiko leziFo eziThathelwanako (i-NICD) enomborweni yesizo ethi-082 883.
tgt_text: Shango ḽa Singapore ndi mubindudzi muhulwane fhano kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe, hune ha vha na vhubindudzi ha masheleni fhiraho R5 biḽioni kha sekhithara dzi fanaho na zwa vhumagi, tshumelo dza zwa masheleni na zwa ndaka.

src_text: Iinlimukiso ngokuthi ikholera ilapheka njani ungazithola kubunzinzolwazi i-www.nicd.ac.za.
tgt_text: Thendelano dzo sainwaho vhukati ha mashango aya mavhili ndi dzine dzo livhiswa kha khwaṱhisa mbambadzo, vhubindudzi, pfunzo na tshumisano kha zwa vhupileli.

src_text: Ihlolo Ngabantu Abasebenzako Yaqobe Kota (i-QLFS).
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya nga ha Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki tsha Kapa Vhukovhela (DDM).

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhuthazekile ngokuthi i-QLFS yokuthoma yee-2023 itjengise ihlandla lesithandathu ngokulandelana lokukhuphuka ngenani lemisebenzi qobe kota nangokuthi inani labantu abasebenzako abaziingidi ezili-.
tgt_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho fara Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya vhurathi ya nga ha DDM ya fhaḽa Kapa Vhukovhela, kha Masipala Wapo wa Drakenstein, kha Tshiṱiriki tsha Cape Winelands, nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 19 Shundunthule..

src_text: 2 likhakhabela eduze neengidi ezili-.
tgt_text: Phresidennde vho ranga phanḓa vhurumelwa vhu bvaho kha masia mararu muvhuso nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “A hu Tei vha na Tsaleli”.

src_text: 4 zabantu ababesebenza ngaphambi kokusahlela kwesifo sengogwana ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Imbizo iyi yo vha yo rangelwa phanḓa nga madalo Phresidennde kha vhupo vhu re henefho nga tsini ha Tshiṱuṱuwedzi tsha Mveledziso ya Vhudzulo ha Vhathu ha Vlakkeland, vhune ha vha vhupo vhuhulwanesa ha mveledziso ya vhudzulo ha tshitshavha swika zwino kha Masipala Wapo wa Drakenstein.

src_text: Lesi-ke sitjengiso esikhanyako esifakazela ukuthi umnotho weSewula Afrika uhluma ngobutjha ngamandla ngemva kwalesisifo esikhe sarhagala.
tgt_text: Mveledziso ye ya thomiwa nga ṅwaha wa 2017 dzi ḓo ri musi dzi tshi khunyeledzwa, dza ṋetshedza madzulo swikala 2 556 kha vhathu vho teaho vhane vha tea vhuelwa.

src_text: Inani labantu abasebenzako ngekota yokuthoma litjengisa ukuthi imisebenzi ezii-209 000 ibe sekorweni ehlelekileko, kwathi imisebenzi eli-107 000 yavuleka ekorweni engakahleleki ngekota yokuthoma yomnyaka.
tgt_text: Zwa fhaṱwa ha nnḓu dzi swikaho 942 kha Luṱa lwa Thoma zwazwino zwi kati, lune ho no khunyeledzwa dziṅwe dzi swikaho 454 ngeno dziṅwe dza 301 hu hone dzi tshi kha ḓi vha kati na fhaṱiwa.

Ndeme ya thandela iyi ndi ya uri ṋetshedza tshaka dzo fhambanaho dza dzinnḓu bva kha idzo dza avho vhane vha vha na muholo wa vhukati ha R0 swika R3 500 (nga fhasi ha Vula Nḓila Ntswa) ya kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Sabusidi ya Muthu Muthihi yo Ṱumanywaho na Masheleni, kha avho vhane vha hola muholo wa vhukati ha R3,501 na R22 000 nga ṅwaha.

src_text: Ubudlelwano BeSewula Afrika Ne-United States (i-US).
tgt_text: Zwoṱhe zwikhala zwa Nnḓu dza zwa Matshilisano khathihi na zwikhala zwa Nnḓu dza Vhahali vha zwa Mmbi zwi wanala kha thandela iyi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ifakazile ukuthi nangambala ubudlelwano beSewula Afrika ne-US busese buhle, buqinile, begodu buwahlomulisa womabili amazwe la, ngemva komhlangano hlangana kwakaNgqongqotjhe wezeTjhebiswano lamaZwe ngamaZwe nokuSebenzisana, uDorh.
tgt_text: Madalo Vhulavhelesi kha Masipala Muhulwane wa eThekwini na kha Masipala wa Tshiṱiriki wa uMgungundlovu nga ḽa 18 na 19 Shundunthule.

src_text: Naledi Pandor noMzenda we-US eSewula Afrika uNom.
tgt_text: Muthusaphresidennde Vho Paul Mashatile vho amba na vhathu vha kwameaho bva kha zwa pfunzo na vhugudisi, vhulimivhufuwi, makwevho na nḓowetshumo nga tshifhinga tsha madalo avho zwa vhulavhelesi fhaḽa kha Masipala Muhulwane wa eThekwini na kha Masipala wa Tshiṱiriki wa uMgungundlovu sa tshipiḓa tsha madalo vhulavhelesi DDM.

src_text: Reuben
tgt_text: Iṅwe ya thandela dza ndeme dze dza dalelwa, ho vha vhupo ha Thandela ya Tshanduko ya Ntshongweni, hune ha vha vhupo vhune khaho ha khou fhaṱiwa Ḓorobo yo Bveledzeaho kha zwa Thekhinoḽodzhi vhukati ha ḓorobo ya Durban na ya Pietermaritzburg.

src_text: Brigety, ngamagama akhe awakhuluma athi batjho iSewula Afrika ihlomisa i-Russia (ngeenkhali).
tgt_text: Thandela iyi ḓo vusulusa mishumo ya zwa ikonomi kha vhupo honoho, lune ya ḓo ḓisa vhubindudzi vhu linganaho R15 biḽioni kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha ya 10 ya kha ya 15 ḓaho.
Themamveledziso dza maḓi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuyelele yaqinisa ukuthi iindlela zokusebenzisana ngabosomaqhinga zikhona zisetjenziswa kiwo woke amazwe, hlangana nawo ekubalwa nayo i-US, la kungakhulunyelwa khona imiraro yokulawula ubudlelwano bobubili bamazwe lawa.
tgt_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho dalela Thandela ya Maḓi ya Lesotho Highlands nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 23 Shundunthule 2023 he vha shela mulenzhe kha vhuṱambo ha vula Luṱa lwa 2 lwa thandela iyi.

Sa thandela yo sainiwaho miṅwaha minzhi yo fhelaho nahone ya dovha ya vha na tshilengo, hovhu vhuṱambo ho sumbedza ndeme ya engedzwa ha luvhilo lwa shumiwa ha thandela iyi ine ya vha mushumo wa ndeme wa vhukati ha mashango aya mavhili.

src_text: IKhabinethi isithokozele isimemezelo sikaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sokusungulwa kwephenyo elizijameleko elizakuphenya izwangobatjho ethi iSewula Afrika ihlomisa i-Russia.
tgt_text: Heyi Thandela ya Maḓi ya Lesotho Highlands ndi ya ndeme kha ita uri hu vhe na nḓisedzo ya maḓi kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng, Free State, Mpumalanga, Devhula Vhukovhela na Kapa Devhula.

src_text: Imininingwana yephenyweli izakumenyezelwa khona duze nje.
tgt_text: Hovhu vhubindudzi ha kha themamveledziso ya maḓi vhune ha ḓo khwinifhadza matshilo vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe vhu khou bvela phanḓa nga mukovho wa masheleni fhiraho R14 biḽioni kha mimasipala itela tandulula thaidzo dza salela murahu ha themamveledziso dza zwa maḓi, nga kha Gavhelo ḽa Themamveledziso ya Dzingu nga Vhunzhi (RBIG) khathihi na Gavhelo ḽa Themamveledziso ya Tshumelo dza zwa Maḓi (WSIG).
Masheleni RBIG ḓo shumiswa kha thandela dzi swikaho 130 ngeno ayo WSIG tshi ḓo kovhelwa kha thandela dzi fhiraho 400 mona na shango.

src_text: Ubudlelwano BeSewula Afrika Ne-Singapore.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou dovha hafhu ya pfa yo takadzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri Muhasho wa zwa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili (DWS) khou vha na mvelaphanḓa khulwane kha nndwa ya lwa na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa hune masheleni swikaho R600 miḽioni vha no badelwa murahu nga khamphani dze dza vhuelwa nga wana thendara dzi songo ḓaho nga ngona.

src_text: UMengameli Ramaphosa usingethe ivakatjho likaNdunakulu u-Lee Hsien Loong weRiphabhligi ye-Singapore ngeLesibili womhla we-16 kuMrhayili wee-.

src_text: I-Singapore ililizwe eliqakathekileko elisisisa lapha eSewula Afrika, njengoba amasiso wayo adlula imali emabhiliyoni ama-R5 emakorweni anjengewokukhiqiza, zeemali kunye nezokwakhiwa nokuthengiswa kwemakho.
tgt_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽo ṱanganedza Pfufho ya Maitele Avhuḓi ya Dzangano ḽa Magavhelo zwa Matshilisano ḽa Dzitshaka (ISSA) kha zwa Magavhelo zwa Matshilisano Afrika kha ṅwaha wa 2023, ḽine ḽa dzhiela nṱha vhubindudzi ha muvhuso kha matshilo vhana vhashu, nga maanḓa avho vhane vha bva kha miṱa yo shayaho nahone songo tsireledzeaho.

src_text: Iimvumelwano ezitlikitliweko hlangana namazwe amabili la zinqophe ukuqinisa ukusebenzisana kezerhwebo, zamasiso, zefundo nezokuvikela.
tgt_text: Zwa dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu ha pfufho idzi dza maimo nṱha nga shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe, zwo vha nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U engedzwa nga zwiṱuku ha magavhelo zwa matshilisano uri kone katela na vhana vha songo tsireledzeaho: Fhungo ḽa Magavhelo Thikhedzo ya Vhana, Afrika Tshipembe”.
Ho ṱanganedzwa khumbelo dza tama dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu bva kha zwiimiswa zwine zwa vha miraḓo zwi swikaho 48 zwa mashango fhiraho 30 dzhango ḽa Afrika.

tgt_text: Tsheo dza Khabinethe .
Vhupo ha zwa Ikonomi ho Khetheaho (SEZ) ha Namakwa.

src_text: Enye yamaphrojekthi aqakathekileko avakatjhelweko kube yiNtshongweni Catalytic Project lapho kwakhiwa khona i-Smart City hlangana kweTheku noMgungundlovu.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa tiwa ha vhupo ha Namakwa SEZ vhu re ngei Aggeneys kha ḽa Kapa Devhula tiiwa uhu hune ha khou dzinginywa hu khou itwa ya nga Mulayo wa Vhupo ho Khetheaho ha zwa Ikonomi, wa ṅwaha wa 2014 (Mulayo 16 wa 2014) nahone iyo SEZ ine ya khou dzinginywa ndi tshipiḓa tsha Fulo ḽa zwa Vhubindudzi ḽa Phresidennde.

src_text: IPhojekthi le izakuvuselela imisebenzi yomnotho kilendawo, ngaleyindlela kungene imali elinganiselwa kumabhiliyonini ali-R15 ngamasiso, eminyakeni eli-10 ukuya keli-15 ezako.
tgt_text: Hovhu vhupo ha Namakwa SEZ vhu ḓo vula zwikhala zwa mbuelo kha zwa migodi, vhubveledzi ha geseluḓi dala, vhubveledzi ha themamveledziso, fulufulu ḽi vusuluseaho na zwa shandukiswa ha zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi zwa vha zwiḽiwa.
Hedzi sekhithara ndi dza ndeme kha sikwa ha mishumo khathihi na mveledziso ya ikonomi ya vhupo ha Kapa Devhula khathihi na shango nga angaredza..

src_text: Umthangalasisekelo Wezamanzi
tgt_text: Vhubindudzi ha masheleni fhiraho R29 biḽioni ho no ḓi fulufhedziswa swika zwino kha luṱa lwa thoma lwa SEZ.
Hezwi zwi katela pfulufhedziso bva kha vha Vedanta Zinc (R16 biḽioni), Frontier Rare Earth (R13 biḽioni), Hive Energy (R200 miḽioni) na RRS Trade and Investment (R100 miḽioni)..

src_text: UMengameli Ramaphosa uvakatjhele ihlelo lokuphakela amanzi i-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ngeLesibili womhla wama-23 kuMrhayili wee-2023 lapho abe khona nesandla ekambisweni yokuphendulwa kwesoyi yesiGaba 2 salelihlelo.
tgt_text: Luṱa lwa Vhuraru lwa Maano Zwiko zwa Maḓi zwa Lushaka (NWRS-3).

src_text: Ngemva kobana sekuminyaka satlikitlwa lesisivumelwano salelihlelo nangemva kobana seliriyade kangaka, ikambiso yamva le ibe lithemba lokuliphakamisa iinyawo lelihlelo eliqakathekileko.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza NWRS-3 2023 uri ithome shumiswa nahone maano aya ndi ane vha mbofho kha maanḓalanga na zwiimiswa zwoṱhe zwine zwa khou shumisa Mulayo wa Maḓi wa Lushaka, wa 1998 (Mulayo 36 wa 1998).

src_text: I-Lesotho Highlands Water Project iqakathekile ekuqinisekiseni ukutholakala kwamanzi e-Gauteng, eFreyistata, eMpumalanga, eTlhagwini Tjingalanga kunye neTlhagwini Kapa.
tgt_text: Haya maano dzudzanywa hu tshi tevhedzwa tsenguluso ya miṅwaha miraru ya NWRS-2, ine ya vha yone ye ya ṱalusa masia ane ha vha na mvelaphanḓa khathihi na ayo ane kha ḓi vha na khaedu..

NWRS-3 yo vhumbwa nga zwipikwa zwiraru zwine zwa elana, zwine masia maḓi na vhuthathazwitzhili tea tikedza mveledziso yazwo fheliswa ha vhushai na tshayandingano shela mulenzhe kha ikonomi na sika mishumo, na uri maḓi tea tsireledzwa shumiswa bveledziswa ṱhogomelwa na langwa nga nḓila ine nga vha hone lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu nahone nga nḓila linganaho.

src_text: Ukusetjenziswa kweensetjenziswa nemithombo yamandla emthangalenisisekelo ukuphakamisa ipilo yamaSewula Afrika kusaragela phambili njengoba abomasipala sebabelwe imali engaphezulu kwamabhiliyoni ali-R14 kobanyana balungise imiraro yokusalela emva komthangalasisekelo, ngesiBonelelo somthangalasisekelo i-Regional Bulk Infrastructure Grant (i-RBIG) nese-Water Services Infrastructure Grant (i-WSIG).
I-RBIG izokusetjenziswa emaphrojekthini ali-130 bese kuthi i-WSIG ihlukaniselwa amaphrojekthi angaphezulu kwama-400 elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Haya maano dzinginya makumedzwa pfalaho u engedza nḓisedzo ya maḓi fhungudza ṱhoḓea ya maḓi, ndangulo yavhuḓi ya maḓi na vhuthathazwitzhili langa sekhithara ya maḓi na vhuthathazwitzhili ṋetshedza hafhu maḓi hu tshi itelwa tshanduko ṱuṱuwedza tshumisano ya dzitshaka langa maḓi na vhuthathazwitzhili nga fhasi ha kilima ine ya khou shanduka..
Heyi NWRS-3 anḓadzwa kha webusaithi ya DWS ine ya vha www.dws.gov.za..

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozile nangokuthi umNyango wezaManzi nezokuHlwengisa (i-DWS) wenza indima ebonakalako ekulwiseni ubukhohlakali, njengoba pheze seyihlanganisa ama-R600 weengidi imali esele ibuyiswe ziinkhampani ezahlomula ngamathenda ayeragwe ngokungasimthetho.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa nga ha maga thomaho shumiswa nga Muhasho wa zwa Vhupileli (DoD) hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dza mikhwa na vhuḓifari ha miraḓo ya Mmbi ya Vhupileli ha Lushaka ya Afrika Tshipembe (SANDF) vhane vha vha vho rumelwa kha mishumo ya ḓisa mulalo..

src_text: IKhabinethi itjhejile nokuthi sekunamagadango abekiweko wokukhandela abekwe mnyango wezamanzi ukuqeda ukusetjenziswa kwemali ngokungakafaneli, nangendlela engabuyiseliko nekudlala ngemali.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ine shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽa khou ita hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dza vhuḓifari ha miṅwe miraḓo ya SANDF ine ya vha yo rumelwa kha mishumo ya ḓisa mulalo mona na dzhango ḽa Afrika.

SANDF yo ḓi dzulela vhonala sa tshiko tsha ḓihudza ha lushaka sa izwi tshi shela mulenzhe kha vhurumelwa ha ḓisa mulalo kha dzhango ḽa Afrika itela uri hu vhe na mulalo na vhudziki kha dzitshaka dzine dza vha dzo hoṱefhadzwa nga dzinndwa fhano kha dzhango ḽa Afrika tshi khou shuma nga fhasi ha Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshakha (UN)..

src_text: UNongorwana Wezokuvikeleka Komphakathi .
tgt_text: Musi hu tshi vha na mavharivhari milandu ya zwa vhudzekani nga ṅwaha wa 2015, ho mbo ḓi vhumbwa Tshigwada tsha shuma tsha Vhukati ha Dziminisṱa nga ṅwaha wa 2019 itela uri hu kone ṱoḓisiswa milandu iyi ya sa fara zwavhuḓi na tambudza lwa vhudzekani (SEA) ine ya bvelela ngomu kha DoD..

src_text: ISewula Afrika ithokozwe ngonongorwana orhanyazelako wamazwe ngamazwe
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo fushea nga mutevhe wa maga a vhewa itela tandulula thaidzo dza zwiito zwa SEA ngomu kha vhurumelwa ha ḓisa mulalo ha SANDF.

src_text: wokuvikeleka komphakathi nokusebenza kuhle ngeendaba zomphakathi emazweni we-Afrika emnyakeni wee-2023 – i-International Social Security Association (i-ISSA) Good Practice Award in Social Security for Africa 2023 – othokoza umsebenzi karhulumende wokusiza epilweni yabantwabethu, khulukhulu labo ababuya emakhaya anganalitho nanganabuyo.
tgt_text: Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka ḽi dzhia shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe sa ḽine ḽa vha na maitele khwinesa nahone ḽo fhululedza shango ḽashu kha mvelaphanḓa ye ḽa ita kha nndwa ya fhelisa tshoṱhe zwiito zwa SEA ngomu kha SANDF.
Khabinethe yo ombedzela uri zwiito zwa SEA zwi nga ḓo konḓelelwa uri zwi bvele phanḓa na tshinyadza rekhodo yavhuḓi ine SANDF ya vha nayo kha dzhango ḽa Afrika..

src_text: ISewula Afrika ingene kilonongorwana orhanyazelako ngesihloko esithi: “Kancanikancani Selula Isandla Sokuvikela Abantwana Abacaphazeka Lula Emphakathini: Indaba YesiBonelelo SabaNtwana, ESewula Afrika.” Babe li-138 abebaphalisana bavela eenjamisweni ezima-48 ezimalunga emazweni we-Afrika angaphezulu kwama-.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa wa ṅwaha wa.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamushumo ya Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa ya 2023 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U engedza mbofholowo ya vhaswa kha zwa ikonomi hu tshi itelwa vhumatshelo ha tshifhinga tshilapfu”.

src_text: Isizo lethu lokwenyula umphakathi liyisika yehlelo likarhulumende lokwethula abantu umtlhago nokubuyisa isithunzi sabantu bekhethu.
Ihlelo lokuvikela umphakathi eSewula Afrika libalwa hlangana namahlelo angamakhulu khulu ephasini, njengoba lihlomulisa abantu abangaphezulu kweengidi ezili-18 nje.
tgt_text: Muthusaphresidennde Vho Mashatile vha ḓo ṋetshedza tshipitshi nga Ḓuvha ḽa Lushaka ḽine kha uno ṅwaha ḽa ḓo pembelelwa lwa tshifhinga tsha maḓuvha mavhili bva nga ḽa 16 swika 17 Fulwi 2023 fhaḽa Sentharani ya zwa Mitambo ya nga Nnḓa ya Mangaung, Bloemfontein, kha ḽa Free State.

Kha tshenetshi tshifhinga tsha maḓuvha mararu, hu ḓo vha na tshikhala tshine ngatsho vhaswa vha ḓo kona shela mulenzhe kha nyambedzano na Dziminisṱa, Vhathusaminisṱa khathihi na vhaṅwe vhashelamulenzhe vha kwameaho nga ha vhugudisi ho fhambanaho, zwikhala zwa mabindu na zwa mveledziso zwine zwa vha hone kha muvhuso na vhashumisani kha zwa matshilele..

src_text: Amavowudi Ngesabelo Seemali
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa ḓo rwelwa ṱari nga Ḽavhuṋa, ḽa 1 Fulwi nga Minisṱa Ofisini ya Phresidennde vho hweswaho maanḓa Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali, Dokotela Vho Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma fhaḽa kha vhupo ha tshiga tsha Tshihumbudzi tsha Hector Pieterso na Muziamu tshi re fhaḽa kha ḽa Soweto..

Khabinethe yo eletshedza tshitshavha uri tshi engedze mafulufulu itela vhona uri vhathu vhaswa vha khou kona swikela zwikhala zwine zwa vha tendela uri vha kone ḓidzhenisa kha zwa shela mulenzhe kha ikonomi nga nḓila yo fhelelaho.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozile ngokuthi amaVowudi ngeSabelo seeMali weminyango karhulumende akhamba kuhle.
tgt_text: Muvhuso, sa wone mutholi muhulwanesa, wo fhindula kha ṱhoḓea dza mveledziso ya zwikili na maanḓafhadzwa ha vhaswa nga ita uri vhaswa vho fhedzaho pfunzo dzavho dza dziyunivesithi vhane vha si vhe na mishumo vha kone wana tshenzhemo ya mishumo nga kha Mbekanyamushumo ya zwa Vhugudi na Vhugudisi ha Mishumo ya avho vho fhedzaho pfunzo dza Yunivesithi ya Muhasho wa Tshumelo dza Muvhuso.

src_text: Nanti irherho elizako lamaVowudi ngeSabelo seeMali nemihlangano yeendaba eliphekelelako:
tgt_text: Muvhuso khou dovha hafhu wa thoma shumisa Tshikwama tsha Mishumo ya zwa Matshilisano, Social Employment Fund (SEF) khathihi na maga u sika mishumo Tshumelo dza Vhaswa dza Lushaka (NYS) vusuluswaho nahone ane kona kungedzela vhaswa vha zwigidi na zwigidi ngomu kha ikonomi.

src_text: ULesihlanu womhla wama-26 kuMrhayili wee-2023 nge-iri le-13:00, uNgqongqotjhe womNyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezeNdabuko (i-CoGTA), uMm.
tgt_text: Maga Mishumo ya Vhaswa Phresidennde na one no ḓi kona tikedza vhaswa kha kona swikela zwikhala zwi swikaho.

src_text: uThembi Nkadimeng uzokubamba umhlangano nembikiindaba ngeVowudi yeSabelo seeMali se-CoGTA ezakubeka amagadango anqophe ukuqinisa ukusebenza kwabomasipala.
tgt_text: 5 miḽioni zwine ngazwo vhaswa vha vha vha tshi khou kona wana miholo ya tshifhinganyana vhewa ha vhaswa kha mishumo swikaho miḽioni nthihi, zwikhala zwa guda zwi katelaho na mishumo zwa 250 000 khathihi na zwiṅwe zwikhala zwa 250 000 zwa tshumelo dzi badelaho hu tshi katelwa na vhaswa vha swikaho 500 000 vhane vho dzheniswa kha zwikhala zwa muholo wa tshifhinga tshilapfu.

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvetamveto ya Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya IPID wa ṅwaha wa 2023 uri rumelwe Phalamenndeni..

src_text: Umbiko Ngamagadango Athethwe Mnyango Wezokuvikela (i-DoD) Ukukhalima Ukuziphatha Kwamalunga Webutho Lamajoni Wezokuvikela (i-SANDF) Athunywe Ukuyokusebenza Emahlelweni Wokuncengelela Ukuthula.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu khwinisa Mulayo wa IPID, wa ṅwaha wa 2011 (Mulayo 1 wa 2011), nahone wa dovha wa ṋetshedza makumedzwa livhiswaho kha khwaṱhisa zwa ḓiimisa nga ndoṱhe ha tshiimiswa na kha mashumele IPID, zwine hezwi zwa khwaṱhisedza izwo zwine zwa ḓivhiwa sa “McBride judgement”.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithole umbiko wendima yokusebenza eyenziwa yiSewula Afrika ukukhalima ukuziphatha Kwamanye Amalunga we-SANDF athunywe ukuyokusebenza emahlelweni wokuncengelela ukuthula elizwekazini le-Afrika.
tgt_text: Khwiniso idzi dzi dovha hafhu dza lavhelesa kha fhungo ḽe ḽa ambiwa nga Khothe ya Ndayotewa ye ya ḓivhadza uri dziṅwe mbetshelwa dza Mulayo wa IPID wa ṅwaha wa 2011 dziho mulayoni, zwine hezwi zwa ṋea maanḓa Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Mapholisa uri vha imise shuma Mulangi Muhulu, vha dzhie maga khaidzo kha Mulangi Muhulu nga murahu ha imiswa hawe shuma, khathihi na pandela Mulangi Muhulu mushumoni.

Mulayotibe dzinginya uri hu vhe na maitele re khagala nahone pfalaho u tholwa ha Mulangi Muhulu khathihi na maitele fhelelaho nahone itwaho nga vhuronwane hu tshi itelwa kona linga fulufhedzea ha vhaofisiri vha IPID.

src_text: I-SANDF beyisijamiso esizikhakhazisa ngaso njengoba sinesandla esisiza ngaso emajimeni wokuncengelela ukuthula elizwekazini le-Afrika ngomnqopho wokwakha ukunzinza nokuthula emazweni we-Afrika aragelelwe zizipi ngaphasi kwephiko leHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN).
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza mbetshelwa ya khwinifhadzwa ha dziṅwe mbetshelwa dza Mulayo Muhulwane, hu itela uri IPID kone ita mushumo wayo nga nḓila yo fhelelaho nahone yavhuḓi.
Iyi mvetamveto ya Mulayotibe nga wanala kha webusaithi ya www.policesecretariat.gov.za.

src_text: Kwathi nakuzwakala izwangobatjho yokuthi amajoni wokuncengelela ukuthula amagamawo abalwa ezenzweni zokugangela abantu abasikazi ngezomseme ngomnyaka wee-2015, ngomnyaka wee-2019 kwasungulwa isiQhema saboNgqongqotjhe kobanyana siphenye ngezwangobatjho yamacala wokugangelwa nokukhahlunyezwa ngezomseme (i-SEA) ngaphakathi kwe-DoD.
